item.title: Trump Ally Sues Powell, Calls for FOMC Meeting Transparency
item.description: July 25th: A firm with the backing of supporters of U.S. President Trump has initiated a lawsuit against Federal Reserve Chairman Powell and other Fed officials, demanding that the Fed conduct its monetary policy meetings in an open manner. The U.S. investor James Fishback's company, Azoria Capital, stated in a lawsuit filed on Thursday that the FOMC's long-standing practice of holding closed-door meetings was in violation of government transparency laws.The fund filed the lawsuit with a federal court in Washington and demanded that the Fed hold an open meeting from July 29th to 30th. The company noted in the lawsuit: "Azoria is highly concerned that under Powell's leadership, the FOMC has maintained high interest rates, which has had a negative impact on President Trump and his economic agenda, and has also damaged U.S. citizens and the U.S. economy." (FX678)

item.title: Tether Mints Additional 1 Billion USDT
item.description: On July 25th, as monitored by Whale Alert, Tether minted 1 billion USDT on the Ethereum network 3 minutes ago. Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino stated that this was an authorized but not yet issued transaction. It will be used as inventory for the next issuance request and for on-chain exchanges.

item.title: Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen has transferred approximately $140 million worth of XRP to a trading platform in the past 7 days
item.description: On July 25th, according to The Block, on-chain analyst ZachXBT pointed out that starting from July 17th, a wallet that has long been associated with Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen has transferred 50 million XRP. This wallet seems to have sent approximately $140 million worth of tokens to three addresses related to exchanges. Meanwhile, another 10 million XRP has been deposited into two newly created wallets. The address under the control of Chris Larsen still holds around 2.81 billion XRP, which is approximately worth $9 billion.Previously, the SEC accused Ripple's CEO Brad Garlinghouse of personally converting $150 million worth of XRP within three years when it sued Ripple in 2020. The SEC also stated that Larsen and his spouse sold $450 million worth of tokens between 2017 and 2020.

item.title: Kalshi is partnering with x.ai to bring Grok to the prediction market.
item.description: On July 25th, Kalshi entered into a partnership with xAI to incorporate Grok into the prediction market.

item.title: Institutional Ethereum Whale Holdings Change in the Last 30 Days: Bitmine Reclaims Top Spot with 566,800 ETH
item.description: On July 25th, based on the data from Strategicethreserve, the following treasury companies and institutions with significant changes in Ethereum holdings within the past 30 days are as follows:Bitmine Immersion Tech (BMNR) takes the first place. It currently holds 566,800 ETH, which is approximately worth $21.1 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have increased by 247.41%.SharpLink Gaming (SBET) ranks second. It currently holds 360,800 ETH, approximately worth $13.5 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have increased by 91.43%.The Ethereum Foundation ranks third. It holds 237,500 ETH, approximately worth $8.86 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have decreased by 8.09%.Bit Digital (BTBT) ranks seventh. It holds 120,300 ETH, approximately worth $4.487 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have increased by 335.53%.BTCS Inc (BTCS) ranks eleventh. item.title: A whale is selling 1.96 million FARTCOIN, equivalent to around $2.72 million
item.description: On July 25th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale withdrew 1.96 million FARTCOIN from Kraken and sold it at an average price of $1.39, thereby receiving 2.72 million USDC.

item.title: USDC Treasury Mints 1 Billion USDC on Ethereum Mainnet
item.description: On July 25th, as monitored by Whale Alert, 2 minutes ago, the USDC Treasury minted 1 billion USDC on the Ethereum blockchain.

item.title: JPMorgan: Cryptocurrency Market has Seen $60 Billion in Inflows Year-to-Date, Investor Interest in Altcoins Rising
item.description: On July 25th, as per The Block, the analysts at Morgan Stanley estimate that a cumulative total of $60 billion has flowed into digital assets starting from the beginning of the year. This inflow is mainly driven by the influx into crypto funds, active trading on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CME), and venture capital funding activities. The analysts point out that since the end of May, the inflows have increased by nearly 50% and are expected to easily surpass the historical record of last year.The analyst stated that a key driving factor is the increasingly favorable regulatory environment in the United States. Investor interest in alternative coins is also on the rise. Among them, Ethereum is the biggest beneficiary. It holds a dominant position in the decentralized finance (DeFi) and smart contract space and is increasingly being incorporated into corporate treasuries along with Bitcoin. item.title: International Monetary Fund: El Salvador's Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Fund Accumulates Bitcoin as Planned
item.description: July 25th: The International Monetary Fund declared that the strategic accumulation of El Salvador's Bitcoin reserve fund meets the planned requirements. El Salvador's holdings of Bitcoin are in compliance with the country's program commitments. The total amount of Bitcoin held in the Salvadoran government wallet remains unaltered. (FX Street)

item.title: OpenAI is preparing to launch GPT-5 in August.
item.description: It is said that OpenAI is getting ready to launch GPT-5 in August. (According to THE VERGE on July 25th.)
